function.name: stringtoxml
function.description: Loads the specified text as XML. Useful to generate (parts of) XML or HTML documents inline.

examples.example: content = "<note id=\"1\"> <to>Tove</to> <from>Jani</from> <heading>Reminder</heading> <comment>This was sent to James as well</comment> <comment>John has not responded to the invitation</comment> <body>Don't forget me this weekend!</body> </note>";

example.description: However, trying to execute this line:
